# PointOfInterestCategories

**Structure**

A structure you use to define points of interest to include or exclude on a map.

## Declaration

```swift
struct PointOfInterestCategories
```

## Categories to include or exclude

- **all**: A list of all points of interest categories, both included and excluded.
- **excludingAll**: A list of point of interest categories to exclude from display on the map.

## Modifying the categories to include or exclude

- **excluding(_:)**: Show all points of interest except those belonging to certain categories using the array you provide.
- **excluding(_:)**: Show all points of interest except those belonging to certain categories using the list you provide.
- **including(_:)**: Show only points of interest belonging to certain categories from the provided array.
- **including(_:)**: Show only points of interest belonging to certain categories from the provided list.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
